LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Misc.SMS.SettingsLogin.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Login from your SMS provider Account

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Misc.SMS.SettingsPassword.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Password from your SMS provider Account

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Misc.SMS.SettingsApiUrl.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: API Url is url which you can get from your sms Provider

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Misc.SMS.SettingsXML.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: You can get special XML for sending SMSes form your Provider. Use #PHONENUMBER# (recipient phone), #ALFANAME# (AlfaName), #MESSAGE# (your message text) to replace neccessary fields in XML.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Misc.SMS.SettingsAlfaName.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: It will be displayed on the recipient screen as a sender name(Use if Supported by your provider)

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Misc.SMS.SettingsAdminPhoneNumber.ErrorMessage
LocaleResource.Value: Invaild.Please enter phone number in the international format (if it's neccessary to notify Admin)

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Misc.SMS.SettingsAdminPhoneNumber.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Please enter phone number in the international format (if it's neccessary to notify Admin)

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Misc.SMS.SettingsEnableAlfaName.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Please enable if you want to use Alfa Name

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Misc.SMS.SettingsEnableXML.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If enabled XML will be used to send request to Provider service

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Misc.SMS.Messages.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Here you can edit text of messages for each Event. Replace Order number field with #ORDERNUMBER# and Order total with #ORDERTOTAL#.
